column2: "Na Moses fii Moab tɛtɛr mu fowee kɔr bepɔw Nebo do
column3: wɔ Pisga etsifi a ɔwɔ Jeriko tsentsendo. Na EWURADZE kyerɛɛ no Gilead asaase nyinara

column5: ɔdze kodu ekyirekyir epo no ho;"

column3: Iyi nye asaase a mekaa ho ntam mekyerɛɛ Abraham
column6: W’asefo na medze mebɛma hɔn no: mama wo kwan dɛ fa w’enyiwa hwɛ

column2: "Nna EWURADZE n’akowaa Moses wuu hɔ wɔ Moab asaase do
"Na osiee no wɔ ɔbɔn no mu wɔ Moab asaase do wɔ Bɛt-peor tsentsendo na n’adakamona dze nyimpa biara nnyim dze bodu ndɛ da yi."
"Na aber a Moses wui no na oedzi mfe ɔha eduonu: n’enyiwa annyɛ kusukusu
"Na Israelmba sui maa Moses wɔ Moab tɛtɛr mu adaduasa: nna Moab n’eyiyɛ mu osu nda no bɔɔ adze."
"Na nyansa sunsum hyɛɛ Nun ne babanyin Josua ma: na Israelmba tsiee no
column3: na wɔyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."

column2: "Na ofitsi aber no nkɔnhyɛnyi biara nnsoɛree wɔ Israel mu bio a ɔtse dɛ Moses a EWURADZE nye no nyaa nkitahodzi a no mu dɔ yie"
"Dɛm Moses yi ara so na EWURADZE somaa no wɔ nsa a ɔyɛ dzen do kɔr Egypt ma ɔkɛyɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze pii wɔ Farao nye no nkowaa nye n’asaase nyinara do no."

column3: ɔnam Moses do na ndzɛmba akɛse a ɔyɛ hu na tum wɔ mu daa edzi wɔ Israel nyinara enyim."
